page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT (1)
page.content: {SHOPS}In the area contained in this block there are several shopping areas for the people of Speke and Hale, which employ a number of persons to serve and run the shops. There are several mobile shops which tour the streets and roads selling eggs, potatoes and other produce. A number of people who live in small- holdings and in Hale Village sell home grown produce from their houses. {STREET MARKETS}Each Thursday and Saturday an open Market is held on a Council site between the Housing Department Offices and the Swimming Baths. The stall holders arrive early and set up various stalls of clothes, china and food stalls. In{Hale}there is a long history of street markets dating back hundreds of years, and recently these have been revived.
